data.title: Port Mourant 24YO Guyana Rum Arcaydia Studio Label No.2 (M&E Drinks)
data.meta_description: Hot on the heels of our inaugural Tokong Rum bottling (a splendid 16yo Long Pond), we are thrilled to present a 1997 Port Mourant rum from Guyana, distilled in a one-of-a kind double wooden pot still, then aged over 24 years on the Continent. Another great bottling selected for us by @valinchandmallet with Singapore-ba
data.text:
Hot on the heels of our inaugural Tokong Rum bottling (a splendid 16yo Long Pond), we are thrilled to present a 1997 Port Mourant rum from Guyana, distilled in a one-of-a kind double wooden pot still, then aged over 24 years on the Continent. Another great bottling selected for us by @valinchandmallet with Singapore-based Arcaydia Studios providing label art expressing the sharply defined flavor profile we love so much. As always, we only bottle at cask-strength without added colouring. This is a tiny allocation of only 60 bottles. Get it before it's gone!

Nose: Intoxicating bouquet of honeyed apricots, haw flakes, preserved nutmegs, vanilla and clove, with undertones of paint, plant oil and dried shitake.

Palate: The characteristic paint and mushroom of Port Mourant is still evident, but we are also getting well-integrated oak and spiced fruit.

Finish: Sweet, medium-length.

ABV: 50.3%

With box?: No
